articles.title: Inference and reconstruction of the heimdallarchaeial ancestry of eukaryotes - Nature.com
articles.description: Analyses of multiple phylogenetic marker datasets of Asgard archaea provide insight into the transition from prokaryotes to eukaryotes, specifically placing eukaryotes within Asgard archaea and as a sister lineage to Hodarchaeales.
